title: Santa Intelligent Gift Recommendation System
summary: A desktop application that recommends suitable gifts by comparing a child's wishlist, interests, and previous gift feedback against a gift catalogue using sentence embeddings, developed as an end-of-year college project.

title: Random Student Picker
summary: A Simple desktop app, that helps teachers randomly pick students from a list, using weighted fairness so the same student isn't selected repeatedly.

title: Data Driven Portfolio Website
summary: A simple, data-driven portfolio website that dynamically loads and renders content from JSON data.
